title: 反斗奇兵－薯蛋頭先生被取消性別，稱呼不再為Mr.

replies.msg:
Hasbro has agreed to neuter gender Mr. Potato Head so kids can create "same-sex families." From now on "they" will be known as Potato Head.


https://apnews.com/article/mr-potato-head-goes-gender-neutral-d3c178f2b9b0c424ed814657be41a9d8
